provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. The Advisory Committee shall consist of not less than seven
members appointed by the Prime Minister, so, however, that two
shall be Senators nominated by the Senate and two shall be members
of the House of Representatives nominated by that House.

provisions.title: Section 5
provisions.content:
5. (1) Any member of the Advisory Committee. other than the
chairman, may at any time resign his oflice by instrument in writing

man, and from the date of the receipt by the Prime Minister of suc4

committee.
      (2) The chairman may at any time resign his ofice by instrument
in writing addressed to the Prime Minister and such resignation shall

provisions.title: Section 8
provisions.content:
8. If any vacancy occurs in the membership of the Advisory
Committee such vacancy shall be filled by the appointment of another
member who shall, subject to the provisions of this Schedule, hold
office for the remainder of the period for which the previous member
was appointed, so. however, that such appointment shall be made in
the same manner and from the same category of persons. if my. as
the appointment of the previous member.

provisions.content:
10. The validity of the p r o f e e d i s of the Advisory Committee

provisions.title: Section 11
provisions.content:
11. The Advisory Committee shall meet at such times as may
                be convenient or expedient for the transaction of business. and at
                su& places as it may deem fit.

provisions.title: Section 12
provisions.content:
12. The chairman shall preside at meetings of the Advisory
                Committee and in the case of his abseoce from any meeting the
                members present shall elect one from amongst their number to pre-
                side at that meeting.

provisions.title: Section 13
provisions.content:
13. The decisions of the Advisory Committee shall be by a majority
                of votes of the members present and voting and, in addition to an
                original vote. the chairman or any other person p@dhg at the
                meeting shall have a casting vote in any case in which the voting is
                &pl.

provisions.title: Section 14
provisions.content:
14. The quorum of the Advisory Committee shall be five members
                thereof.

provisions.title: Section 15
provisions.content:
15. Minutes in proper form shall be kept of the prooeedings of the
